title: MapWebSchema
description:
This schema describes the JSON format used in the data
    function of App.vue that should be the only piece of static information
    changed by a maintainer of this system - changes to the MapWeb JSON objects
    will reflect as logical changes to the way the form is wired, i.e. effects
    and their mappings to intermediates, or, intermediates and their mappings
    to severities, etc. The example given is for the Ant-Bread example MapWeb
    which has a corresponding MapWeb diagram that can be found in this
    directory.

all_intermediates.title: The all_intermediates schema
all_intermediates.description:
Declare here the intermediates that will be used
            in the MapWeb - these are the logical objects that connect Effects'
            firing to how that impacts severity. There are three types of
            intermediate objects: Increments, Binaries, and Counters.
